text: Bridgeport is a census-designated place (CDP) of California in the United States. It is the county seat of Mono County. In the 2020 census, 553 people lived there. It is found at the meeting point of U.S. Route 395 and State Route 182. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:County seats in California Category:Mono County, California
title: Bridgeport, California
